attributes.action: Bring back Local Breakfast Shows on Commercial Radio! & investigate OFCOM
attributes.background: Global Radio have dropped ALL local Breakfast Shows in favour of national shows. Outrage from listeners is ignored and it’s vital we keep local shows. Also, OFCOM need investigating for relaxing rules around this, as I’m convinced some sort of corruption between them and media companies has happened

rejection.details: This is a decision for the radio station and not the UK Government or Parliament
